pages.title: CMY Variant
pages.text: Upgrade your [Pigment Pedestal](book://general/pedestal) by using all the shards you collected on your journey.

pages.title: Pedestal Structure
pages.text: To make use of the [Pigment Pedestal's](book://general/pedestal) advanced abilities you will need a structure to focus gemstone energy into it.\\You call it the\**Spectrum Focus**.

pages.name: Spectrum Focus
pages.text: Dimensions: 11x11x4 blocks. But best to leave a few additional blocks of space around, just to make sure.

pages.title: Block Checklist
pages.text: -1 Pigment Pedestal\-4 Polished Gemstone Blocks\-4 Chiseled Polished Blocks\-4 Notched Polished Blocks\-8 Polished Pillars\-68 Polished Blocks
You can switch the basalt blocks with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks as you like it best. Mix up [#](bb00bb)Calcite[#]() and [#](bb00bb)Basalt[#]() up to create your personal variation!
